name: Mercenary Knight Rose
description:
Early build of my GDEX 2020 jam submission! It's a sidescrolling Action-RPG game in the spirit of Hollow Knight but in a world of flower warriors and marauding insects!

Goal: Defeat the Roach Warriors marauding a helpless Flower Villa!

Lose Condition: Be cut down by a warrior or fall into bramble.

Controls: Controller or Keyboard

A/ Right Mouse Button - Jump

X/ Left Mouse Button - Attack

WASD/Analog stick to move

R - Resize screen from Full Screen to Windowed mode

ESC - Close the game

Tip: There's a secret room with a cool cameo!
